#summary Drag.Multi, Drag.Resize, Windoo extension features.
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

    * allows resize in 8 directions
    * fully customizable resize directions
    * works on Firefox, Opera, Safari, and IE 6, 7 (with some quirks yet)
    * supports custom and container element limits for resize
    * fully customizable Windoo themes
    * preserve aspect ratio option
    * multiple window managers
    * supports iframe overlay for IE (workaround to <select> bug)
    * generates valid XHTML strict code
